name: Epic Stickman Fighting Game
description:
The Epic Stickman - Slow Motion - the Stickman fighting game is based on realistic physics games, fighting games, oribash, ragdoll fight, It's total a Free Games on mobile.

STICKMAN FIGHTING GAMEPLAY

- Clear a chapter to get Star rewards.

- Use Star to upgrade your supreme stickman, Level Up supreme stickman will increase HP and Mana for your Epic Stickman

- Flying, backflip, rolling, and keep balance your supreme stickman to punch, kick on the opponent supreme stickman.

- Supreme Stickman complete stages when killing all opponent supreme stickman.

- The Stickman Slow-Motion will die when HP of the epic stickman comes to Zero.

- MANA of epic stickman will affect Damp Power, Flying Speed, and Backflip speed.

- Slow Motion gameplay will appear when supreme cause Damp to the opponents.


HOW TO PLAY STICKMAN FIGHTING GAME

- Only Use Joystick to control all actions of supreme stickman: Flying, Backflip, Rolling, Punch, Kick, Balance

- flying, backflip continuously to avoid the opponent supreme stickman, keep balance your stickman then attack the opponents

- Manna of supreme stickman will get Zero when supreme stickman gets hurt.

- Clear chapters to get Star rewards then Upgrade Supreme Stickman Level.


SUPREME STICKMAN SLOW-MOTION FEATURED

- PVP Mode: play with friend, 2 player fighting in a phone.
- Stickman Slow-Motion Fighting Game is Slow Motion, a physic game, fighting game.

- Simple Control with Joystick: control supreme stickman with action and keep Balance in the Playground easily.

- Classic Style: We design UI, Playground very simple, and focus on feeling playing games.

- Challenge Game: Epic Stickman Game design multiple Chapters with many stages with increasing levels deep.

- Exciting Playground: there are simple shapes such as square, bounce circle in the playground

- Free Game: Stickman Slow-Motion Fighting Game is a Free Game.

Let's play Epic Stickman - Slow Motion - Fighting Game to discover the exciting gameplay now! Stick Fight is a Free Game but it will bring to you many gameplay feelings.

Give us feedback for Stickman Physics Slow-Motion Fighting Game then we will update to make it better, please!
